'''''aurë''''' means "day as opposite to night" in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 148</ref>
==Etymology==
*Root [[UR]]

==Examples==
* ''[[Utúlie'n aurë!|utúlie’n '''aurë'''!]]'' = "the day has come!"<ref>{{GA}}, Note 2, p. 166</ref>

==Cognates==
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[aur]]''
